artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: The Thai Silk Co. Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Vert. striped print that resembles ikat Vert. Printed striped pattern resembles ikat weave. Stylized corn stalks of saffron, olive & spice on ecro background. Handwoven & handprinted. Saffron

text: Bukhara is seen in the black and white photograph as the upholstery on the chaise longue near the windows.
title: Bukhara
